Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer Rapid Serum Tube Blood Collection Tube with Hemogard Closure
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer Rapid Serum Tube Blood Collection Tube with Hemogard Closure
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer Rapid Serum Tube Blood Collection Tube with Hemogard Closure for rapid serum separation and chemistry determinations.
Indications for Use Summary: Single use tube for collecting, separating, transporting, and processing venous blood specimens to obtain serum for chemistry determinations for in vitro diagnostic use.
